entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of wet flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of wet flurries this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
